text: Sholim at Aichi Triennale 2019, Nagoya, Japan Milos Rajkovic (born 1985 in Belgrade) is a Serbian animator known by the pseudonym Sholim. Sholim is known for his surreal looped GIFs and animations. ==See also== * GIF art ==References== == External links == * Category:Living people Category:1985 births Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Serbian animators Category:People from Belgrade
title: Sholim
